headline: Ideal City verdict: VerdictEnum.ACCEPT

headline: Ideal City verdict: REJECT
body: Missing explicit world constraints; risk flagged.
No logic outline captured; adjudication cannot verify flow.
No risks documented; world authority will watch closely.
Success criteria absent; outcomes may be ambiguous.
- Provide at least one acknowledged constraint.
- Submit a step-wise logic outline before execution.
